title: Timeline of Donald Trump's first presidency (2017 Q1)
added: * The President falsely claims that the murder-rate in America is at a 47-year-high.<ref>{{Cite web|last=Stelter|first=Brian|date=2017-02-07|title=Trump faults media while lying about murder rate|url=https://money.cnn.com/2017/02/07/media/murder-rate-donald-trump-media-conspiracy-theories/index.html|access-date=2020-09-07|website=CNNMoney}}</ref>
* The President tells a sheriff they should destroy the career of a Texas state law-maker who opposed [[Civil forfeiture in the United States|civil forfeiture]].

* The President publicly chastises [[Nordstrom]] for not carrying his daughter [[Ivanka Trump|Ivanka Trump's]] brand.<ref>{{Cite web|last=|first=|date=|title=President Trump on Twitter|url=https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump/status/829356871848951809|url-status=live|archive-url=|archive-date=|access-date=2020-09-07|website=Twitter|language=en}}</ref>

* The President refers to [[Elizabeth Warren]] as '[[Pocahontas]]' due to her claimed [[Native Americans|Native American]] ancestry.<ref>{{Cite web|last=CNN|first=Phil Mattingly and Ted Barrett|title=Trump to Dems: 'Pocahontas is now the face of your party'|url=https://www.cnn.com/2017/02/10/politics/donald-trump-elizabeth-warren-voter-fraud/index.html|access-date=2020-09-07|website=CNN}}</ref>

* [[Not My Presidents Day]] protests against the presidency across the country.<ref>{{Cite web|last=Schouten|first=Fredreka|title=Thousands expected at ‘Not My Presidents Day’ rallies Monday|url=https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/politics/2017/02/19/donald-trump-not-my-presidents-day-protests/98130952/|access-date=2020-09-07|website=USA TODAY|language=en-US}}</ref>
